content:
Take Notes on a Call

Record the call’s outcome and take notes about the call so it’s easy for other agents to get up to speed in case the customer calls back.

REQUIRED USER PERMISSIONS
To answer and make calls and view Voice records: Contact Center Agent permission set.

On a Voice Call record, go to the Call Notes section.
In the Call Resolution field, select the answer that best describes the call’s outcome.
In the Description field, jot down information about the call.
Click Save.
title: Taking Notes on a Voice Call in Service Cloud
